node.title: What's the plan to manage Covid this winter?
node.description: Health service figures are calling for stricter Covid restrictions in England to protect the NHS.
node.content:
["", "
Shoppers on Regent Street, October 2021
", "Covid isn't over, and there will be \"hard months to come in the winter,\" England's deputy chief medical officer has warned. ", "There have been calls for stricter Covid restrictions in England recently, but Chancellor Rishi Sunak said the data does not currently suggest \"immediately moving to Plan B\".", "
Who's calling for Plan B and why?
", "In the last week of October, daily Covid cases rose above 50,000 and Health Secretary Sajid Javid warned they could double. ", "Numbers have since dropped back slightly, but the seven-day average is still above 40,000.", "A number of medical bodies have called for action:", "
Does Plan B mean another lockdown?
", "The government has consistently said there are no plans for another lockdown in England.", "Health Secretary Sajid Javid told MPs in September that the government could bring in extra measures in England - \"Plan B\" - to protect the NHS from \"unsustainable pressure\":", "The restrictions listed under Plan B are: ", "These would bring England effectively in line with restrictions now in place in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.", "Mr Javid said on 20 October that there were still no current plans to bring in Plan B, although he warned that restrictions were more likely if vaccine take-up faltered.", "
What could trigger Plan B?
", "No single event or set of figures would necessarily trigger Plan B, but the government said it would monitor: ", "", "
Graphic showing measures to be taken under the government's Covid plan B for winter
", "", "
1px transparent line
", "
What's the government's current strategy?
", "Plan A is the winter strategy currently in operation in England, and is centred on encouraging take up of Covid vaccines and boosters. Measures include:", "More than eight million people have now had a booster or third primary jab in the UK, but 13% of people aged over 12 are still unvaccinated.", "
What restrictions are still in place in England?
", "What are the full rules in England?", "", "
A woman holds a small bottle labelled \"Covid-19 vaccine\", 30 October 2020
", "
What's the situation in Wales?
", "First Minister Mark Drakeford has announced a slight toughening of restrictions in response to rising cases:", "Other restrictions include:", "", "
Drinkers in bar
", "
What's Northern Ireland's winter plan?
", "The Northern Ireland Executive's autumn/winter Covid contingency plan sets out a range of measures which could be deployed if hospital pressures become \"unsustainable\", including:", "
What restrictions are currently in place in Northern Ireland?
", "What are Northern Ireland's Covid-19 rules now? ", "
What's the situation in Scotland?
", "Covid in Scotland: What are the rules?"]
